page.title: 17GIRL GUIDES 1st Staplefield
page.content: { Lord Baden Powell}started Guides 75 years ago in{1910.}Guides is quite different now from when it first started. We are{girls}aged from{10 _15 yrs. Before that there is{Brownies}for girls from{7_10 yrs. Guides are divided into{patrols}with {6_8 girls}in each. Each patrol has a leader and a second and has the name of a bird,such as the Robins,the Thrushes and the Kingfishers. At meetings we play games, talk about camping and get ready to take badges in things like first aid, cookery, needlework and camping. When we are enrolled, we have to make The Guide Promise which says,'I promise that I will do my best to do my duty to God,to serve the Queen,to help other people and to keep the Guide Laws.'
